original_text: Take seven of every kind of bird. Take males and females. Do this so that they will give birth to young ones. Then each different kind of animal and bird will continue to live on the earth.
korean_text: 공중의 새도 암수 일곱씩을 데려와 그 씨를 온 지면에 유전하게 하라

sentences.original_text: Take seven of every kind of bird
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 종류의 새 각각 일곱 마리를 데려오라

sentences.original_text: so that they will give birth to young ones
Then each different kind of animal
and bird will continue to live
